name: Paik Nam June
image: Portrait of Nam June Paik-by Lim Young-kyun-1981.jpg
caption: Nam June Paik in New York City, 1983. Photo by Lim Young-kyun
summary: Nam June Paik (Korean: 백남준, July 20, 1932 – January 29, 2006) was a Korean American artist. He worked with a variety of media and is considered to be the founder of video art. He is credited with an early usage (1974) of the term "electronic super highway" in application to telecommunications.
